about_the_game:
Since the discovery of the tablet of the Old Masters, the world is in the midst of the winds of change and the future is full of uncertainty. As a wandering artist, your journey takes you to a mystical valley. Will you find inspiration for your art there?

Valley of the Old Masters is an old-school action-adventure game. It features a cryptic world full of secrets to be discovered, a mysterious background story and many challenges and problems to solve.

  • Wander through a mysterious valley.
  • Find ancient sketches and paintings. Be inspired by them and draw your own sketches to fill your sketchbook.
  • Meet other wanderers who are as lost as you are.
  • Discover the dungeons of the valley full of mysterious and cryptic problems to solve.
  • Solve the mystery of the Old Masters. Who were they and why have they disappeared?
